title: Slashdot on Stross
author: VD
content_html: You have to read any discussion that starts off with a mention of a Matrioshka Brain in the header. The man has a gift, a gift, I tell you!
content_text:
You have to read any discussion that starts off with a mention of
a Matrioshka Brain
in the header.  The man has a gift, a gift, I tell you!
